```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
 calfire_damage <- read.csv("calfire_damage.csv")
ggplot(calfire_damage, aes(x = year, y = structures)) +
  geom_point(color = "orange") +
  labs(
    x = "Year",
    y = "Numbers of Structures Destroyed",
    title = "California Fire Damage Per Year",
  )
```
